apps.name: Delta (Alpha)
apps.subtitle: Classic games in your pocket.
apps.versionDescription:
NEW
• _Lots_ of bug fixes from the previous alpha (thanks y'all!)
• "Export Save File" option when long-pressing game

PREVIOUS ALPHA
• Option to switch between melonDS and DeSmuME cores
• Manage individual core settings from Delta settings (DS cores only currently)
• "Home Screen" DS game to open DS main menu (melonDS core only)
• UI flow for importing melonDS BIOS
• View Delta's documents directory in Files
• Support for fast forwarding DS games
• Support for Action Replay cheat codes for DS games (melonDS core only)
• Support for 8 character Game Genie cheat codes for NES games
• Fixes errors when saving in some DS games
• Fixes incorrect formatting when typing cheats
• Fixes emulation freezing when melonDS core restarts
apps.localizedDescription:
The next console for Delta is coming: this beta version of Delta brings support for playing DS games!

DS support currently includes:
• Playing DS games
• Save States
• Hold Button

Features I'm still working on:
• Fast Forward
• Cheats
• Controller skin (using placeholder controller skin for now)

Please report any issues you find to support@altstore.io. Thanks!

permissions.usageDescription: Allows Delta to use images from your Photo Library as game artwork.
